name: XOXO Droplets Full Version Extension
detailed_description:
If the base version of XOXO Droplets just doesn't have enough options for your liking, this extension will fix that right up.

Features:
  • 3 more main jerk boyfriend options: Bae Pyoun, Jeremy King, and Pran Taylor
  • 2 sweet but not-terribly-bright side boyfriend options: Kam Sung and Adrian Wulu
  • Extra Date Events for Everett, Nate, and Shiloh
  • Over 280,000 words
  • 50 more Random Events
  • 24 more Part-Time Work Events
  • An accessory system that lets you decorate the main character with a variety of pieces
  • The option to change the background of your cellphone to one of 12 different options
  • Even better cheat codes

short_description: Bump your boyfriend prospects up by four more with the option to date Bae Pyoun, Jeremy King, Pran Taylor, and Adrian Wulu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP and newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
